page.title: 02The Port of Felixstowe
page.content: Felixstowe is a large and expanding port,handling containers,general cargo and passenger traffic. The Walton Container Terminal,built in 1982,is entirely in our block, as is the new Trinity Terminal, at present being built. During the past few months shingle has been dredged up from the harbour and pumped on to the foreshore to form the foundations of Trinity Terminal. This shingle is now being levelled and pile drivers are banging in long steel piles to form the edge of the quay. The Port of Felixstowe is the biggest employer in the area. There are now 1630 employees earning, on average,over fifteen thousand pounds a year, as well as many others working for the companies using the port. The success of the port helps to make Felixstowe and Trimley a very prosperous area .
